article.title: L-3 to Provide Helicopter Display Units
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: L-3 Communications Avionics Systems Inc., Grand Rapids, Mich., was awarded a firm-fixed-price, sole-source contract for $18,631,032 for Chinook (CH-47) Helicopter flight display units. Using military service is Army. The contracting activity is the Defense Logistics Agency Aviation, Redstone Arsenal, Ala.
